snippet: Rising star Lucas Pouille and Gael Monfils have been selected to play for France in the Davis Cup semifinal against Croatia next week....
lead_paragraph: Rising star Lucas Pouille and Gael Monfils have been selected to play for France in the Davis Cup semifinal against Croatia next week.

headline.print_headline: Pouille & Monfils Picked for Davis Cup Semifinal vs. Croatia
headline.main: Pouille & Monfils Picked for Davis Cup Semifinal vs. Croatia
